entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind light except southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 over southern sections early this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
